com.authlete.common.dto.SnsCredentials

  • Packages that use SnsCredentials 
    Package Description
    com.authlete.common.dto
    Requests to and responses from Authlete APIs and some data structures.

    • Uses of SnsCredentials in com.authlete.common.dto

      Methods in com.authlete.common.dto that return SnsCredentials 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SnsCredentials[] Service.getSnsCredentials()
      Get the list of SNS credentials that Authlete uses to support social login.

      Set the API key.

      Set the SNS.
